top_comments.comment: Moqa moqa moqa india ko para choka choka choka

comments_since_last_sample.body: are bhosdiwalo nai nai nai usne paak jit raha usliye nahi bola uska acent he wo comentry ke time jab ayse halat hote jab har raha ho koi match wo achnk jit raha hota he to insan bolta are nahi nhi ye mara ye mara aur bhosdiwalo m indian muslim aur jo nahi nahi bolra he irfan pathan he aur haa indian media n all thoda zyda over hogay the but itna matt uchlo ke aage tumhe b rona pade jitt rahe ho to allah ka shukr ada karo bas aur apne jit enjoy karo muslim hona tum sab ye nahi sikhata islam dusro ki haar par tankid karo beshak samne wala tumhe bol b raha ho to iska ye matlb nahi tum b wse hi kro aur haa har jit sabko milti he inshallah indian team firse strong hoge n proud to b indian muslim❤️❤️
